name: Piston Knight
description:
Piston Knight is a small arcade platformer game. Use your piston limbs to push your main body through the level and reach the target. Avoid obstacles, collect coins, and have a great time!

This game was completed under 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Programming and Music by Buttered Coffe.

Art and Sounds by JustHellygar.

JOIN OUR DISCORD!

  • Use "W" to extend your cap and push the Knight down.
  • Use "S" to extend your legs and push the Knight up.
